description:
When it gets cold and uncomfortable on challenging summits, the best thing to have at your disposal is a Swisswool Piz Duan Jacket for men.

On tours where every gram counts, this lightweight insulation jacket provides optimal protection from the cold and wind. The outer material is breathable, wind and water-resistant Tec Stretch, while lightweight 70g/m² Swisswool provides an insulating lining. Thanks to a sophisticated processing technique, the Swisswool Piz Duan Jacket for men is comfortably elastic, guaranteeing maximum freedom of movement even on challenging terrain. Extremely practical: This lightweight insulated jacket can be completely packed away in its own breast pocket and attached to your belt via loops. So it can be grabbed quickly, even on difficult terrain.

The Swisswool Piz Duan Jacket for men has an unbeatable weight-to-insulation ratio that makes it the best possible companion for high alpine activities: whether on a tour in summer or a ski tour in winter.
name: Ortovox Swisswool Piz Duan Jacket - Mens
